feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: Fathom being thus informed of the suspicion under which he stood, could not help smiling at the eagerness with which the spectators flew upon him, and suffered himself to be made prisoner by the people of the house, who ran to the coach door in obedience to the summons of the wine merchant.

causedByEvent.name: Being accused of being the Young Pretender

takePlaceAt.name: Inn where the passengers used to eat their breakfasts

hasObject.name: Being accused of being the Young Pretender
